name: Brownian Bass
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00] 
fRating=5.000000 
fGammaAdj=2.000000 
fDecay=0.980000 
fVideoEchoZoom=1.980193 
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.360000 
nVideoEchoOrientation=2 
nWaveMode=0 
bAdditiveWaves=0 
bWaveDots=0 
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0 
bMaximizeWaveColor=1 
bTexWrap=0 
bDarkenCenter=0 
bMotionVectorsOn=0 
bRedBlueStereo=0 
nMotionVectorsX=12 
nMotionVectorsY=9 
bBrighten=0 
bDarken=0 
bSolarize=0 
bInvert=0 
fWaveAlpha=0.800000 
fWaveScale=1.184300 
fWaveSmoothing=0.750000 
fWaveParam=-0.400000 
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750000 
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950000 
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000000 
fWarpScale=1.000000 
fZoomExponent=1.008150 
fShader=0.000000 
zoom=1.126824 
rot=0.000000 
cx=0.500000 
cy=0.500000 
dx=0.000000 
dy=0.000000 
warp=1.445075 
sx=1.000000 
sy=1.000000 
wave_r=0.500000 
wave_g=0.500000 
wave_b=0.500000 
wave_x=0.500000 
wave_y=0.500000 
ob_size=0.010000 
ob_r=0.000000 
ob_g=0.000000 
ob_b=0.000000 
ob_a=0.000000 
ib_size=0.010000 
ib_r=0.250000 
ib_g=0.250000 
ib_b=0.250000 
ib_a=0.000000 
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + .33*sin(time); 
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + .33*sin(time*.888); 
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_g + .33*sin(time*.999); 
per_frame_4=zoom=zoom+.05*sin(time*.876); 
per_pixel_1=fleem=if(above(bass_att,1),-5,10)+if(above(treb_att,1),10,-5); 
per_pixel_2=pitch=acos(x*2-1)*sin(time*1.654); 
per_pixel_3=yaw=acos(y*2-1)*sin(time*1.543); 
per_pixel_4=zoom = zoom + .07*sin(ang*fleem+pow(abs(rad-2),4)+time/2-rad)+pitch*.04+yaw*.04; 
per_pixel_5=rot=rot-sin(ang*10+time+cos(rad*2-1))*rad*.3; 
per_pixel_6=zoom = if(below(rad,.2),.9,zoom); 
per_pixel_7=warp=if(below(rad,.2),0,warp);
